price: Na wala si kwa kuwa yupo yeyote aliye mfanyia hisani ndio anamlipa.
arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ
footnotes: Na mtoaji huyu si kama anaye mtu yeyote ambaye ndio anamlipa kwa neema aliyo mfanyia zamani,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā li-aḥadin ʿindahu min niʿ'matin tuj'zā
